whatIsService.title: What Is a Fire & Ice Facial?
whatIsService.content:
Known worldwide as the Hollywood Red Carpet Facial, the Fire & Ice Facial in Pune is a medical-grade treatment designed to instantly resurface the skin, reduce fine lines, clear blemishes and deliver a radiant glow all with zero downtime.

This two-step treatment uses a combination of an intensive resurfacing mask (the Fire) and a cooling, rejuvenating mask (the Ice). Together, they safely exfoliate, hydrate, and refresh the skin, making it the go-to facial for celebrities before big events.

At The Skin Firm, NIBM, Pune, we bring this luxurious yet medically effective treatment to you, tailored to your skin’s needs for maximum results.

process.title: How Our Fire & Ice Facial Works

steps.title: Consultation & Skin Prep
steps.description: We begin with a gentle cleanse and assessment of your skin.

steps.title: The “Fire” Resurfacing Mask
steps.description: A powerful mask with glycolic acid, retinol, and niacinamide is applied to exfoliate dead cells, unclog pores, and resurface the skin.

steps.title: The “Ice” Rejuvenating Mask
steps.description: A cooling, hydrating mask with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and green tea soothes and refreshes, restoring balance and radiance.

steps.title: Finishing Touch
steps.description: Dermatologist-approved serums, moisturisers, and SPF are applied to lock in results.

faqs.title: FAQs on Fire & Ice Facial in Pune

questions.question: 1. What makes the Fire & Ice Facial different from regular facials?
questions.answer: Unlike salon facials, the Fire & Ice Facial is a medical-grade treatment that resurfaces, hydrates, and rejuvenates at a deeper level under the supervision of a dermatologist for Fire & Ice Facial in Pune.

questions.question: 2. Is the Fire & Ice Facial safe for sensitive skin?
questions.answer: Yes, the Hollywood Red Carpet Facial is customised to your skin type, and the “Ice” step ensures soothing, calming, and hydration even for sensitive skin.

questions.question: 3. How long does the Fire & Ice Facial session take?
questions.answer: Each Fire & Ice Medi Facial session takes about 45–60 minutes, making it perfect for busy professionals and brides-to-be.

questions.question: 4. Is there any downtime?
questions.answer: No, you can return to your normal routine immediately after this Fire and Ice Facial.

questions.question: 5. When will I see results?
questions.answer: Instantly! After your Fire & Ice Facial, your skin will look brighter, smoother, and more refreshed with an instant celebrity-like glow.

questions.question: 6. How often can I do the Fire & Ice Facial?
questions.answer: The Fire & Ice Medi Facial can be done every 4–6 weeks for maintenance, or before special occasions as a pre-event glow facial Pune treatment.

questions.question: 7. Can men also get the Fire & Ice Facial?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Many male clients visit The Skin Firm, considered the best Fire & Ice Facial clinic in Pune, for a refreshed and youthful appearance.

questions.question: 8. Is Fire & Ice Facial suitable before weddings or photoshoots?
questions.answer: Yes, this is why it’s called the Hollywood Red Carpet Facial. It’s ideal as a bridal Fire & Ice Facial or for pre-wedding, parties, and professional shoots.

questions.question: 9. Does Fire & Ice Facial help with acne scars and pigmentation?
questions.answer: Yes, the Fire & Ice Facial gently resurfaces and brightens the skin, reducing mild acne scars, pigmentation, and uneven skin tone.

questions.question: 10. How long do the Fire & Ice Facial results last?
questions.answer: The glow from the Fire & Ice Medi Facial can last for weeks. With regular sessions at The Skin Firm, your skin’s health, texture, and radiance improve long-term.
